concept.title: Send Data to the Listening Port
concept.shortdesc: Configure the WebSocket clients to send data to the WebSocket Server listening port.

conbody.p: When you configure the WebSocket Server origin, you define a listening port number where the origin listens for data. To pass data to the pipeline, configure each WebSocket client to send data to a URL that includes the listening port number.same as the Prerequisites for HTTP Server origin, make updates in both places
Use the following format for the URL:<ws | wss>://<sdc_hostname>:<listening_port>/
The URL includes the following components:

ul.li: <ws | wss> - Use wss for secure WebSocket connections over HTTPS.
<listening_port> - The port number where the origin listens for data.
